Question: Can someone post a program template for submitting a solution in Java in Codeforces programming competitions?: :Yes I want to start programming competitions so I dont know how to submit in Java?Answers very apreciatedbye
Please using this api: StringTokenizer.nextToken.
Answer: <<<api>>>: $API
<<<code>>>: $CODE
<<<explanation>>>: $EXPLANATION

API: StringTokenizer
Code:
import java.util.StringTokenizer;

public class Main {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        StringTokenizer st = new StringTokenizer("Hello World");
        while (st.hasMoreTokens()) {
            System.out.println(st.nextToken());
        }
    }
}

Explanation: This program uses the StringTokenizer class to split a string into tokens. The string "Hello World" is split into two tokens "Hello" and "World" and printed to the console.

The StringTokenizer class is part of the java.util package and is used to break a string into tokens. The tokens are obtained using the nextToken() method. The hasMoreTokens() method is used to check if there are more tokens available.

In this code, the StringTokenizer object st is created with the string "Hello World". The while loop continues until there are no more tokens available. In each iteration, the next token is printed to the console.

Please note that the StringTokenizer class is deprecated in Java 9 and onwards. It is recommended to use the java.util.Scanner class for input parsing in competitive programming.

Also, the code is written in Java 8. If you are using a different version of Java, you may need to adjust the code accordingly.

Remember to save your file with a .java extension and compile it using the javac command in the terminal or command prompt. Then, you can run the program using the java command followed by the class name.

For example, if your file is named Main.java, you would compile it with the command:

javac Main.java

And then run it with the command:

java Main

This is a basic template for submitting a solution in Java in Codeforces programming competitions. You can modify it according to your needs.
